distributed.plugin.runtime
Interface IBoardModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
BoardAgent
public interface IBoardModel

Black/White board model API for communication interface of agents, boards and nodes in distributed agent environment

Author:
rpiyasin

Method Summary
 void appendToBoard(java.lang.String info)
          Append info to the end of a board of current host Note: A new entry will be appended into the end of the list of records, if the list is full, the oldest entry will be removed by the system before a new entry appended
 java.util.List<java.lang.String> readFromBoard()
          Read info that posted on a board of current host
 boolean removeRecord(java.lang.String info)
          Delete a given record from a board
 

Method Detail

readFromBoard

java.util.List<java.lang.String> readFromBoard()
Read info that posted on a board of current host

Returns:
a current list of record (in a String format) that currently posted (if exist), otherwise an empty list is returned

appendToBoard

void appendToBoard(java.lang.String info)
Append info to the end of a board of current host Note: A new entry will be appended into the end of the list of records, if the list is full, the oldest entry will be removed by the system before a new entry appended

Parameters:
info - a String of data that will be posted on a board

removeRecord

boolean removeRecord(java.lang.String info)
Delete a given record from a board

Parameters:
info - a data record that written on a board and would like to be removed
Returns:
true if the data found and successfully remove otherwise false
